vote.title: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 20-1940, previously approved on December 9, 2020 for the construction services contract for the Reconstruction of Runway 13R/31L and Taxiway C Phase I Project at Dallas Love Field to establish appropriations in the amount not to exceed $95,266,257.00 in the 2021 AVI Commercial Paper Fund - Not to exceed $95,266,257 - Financing:  2021 AVI Commercial Paper Fund
vote.description: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 20-1940, previously approved on December 9, 2020 for the construction services contract for the Reconstruction of Runway 13R/31L and Taxiway C Phase I Project at Dallas Love Field to establish appropriations in the amount not to exceed $95,266,257.00 in the 2021 AVI Commercial Paper Fund - Not to exceed $95,266,257 - Financing:  2021 AVI Commercial Paper Fund
